EPOCHS: smoldering wasteland under a blood-red sky
OUTFITS: dark ceremonial corset forged from obsidian plates
molten-metal lacework hugging the hips and collarbones
tattered ritual veils shimmering like hot ash
skin-tight demonic armor etched with runes
lace-like straps adorned with burning sigils
ornamental bone jewelry woven along the ribs
LIGHTING: fiery rim light carving the silhouette
soft hellfire glow reflecting on horns and wings
low warm underlight from molten cracks in the ground
dramatic contrast between shadows and ember highlights
subtle golden sparks floating in the warm haze
BACKGROUNDS: expansive infernal landscape filled with drifting ash
deep cavern illuminated by molten rivers
ancient ruin cracked by glowing magma veins
ritual circle carved into charred stone
vast obsidian hall with towering demonic statues
blood-red sky swirling behind infernal peaks
OBJECTS: curved horns shaped like polished obsidian
burning sigils floating around the body
ritual blade embedded in scorched ground
lava droplets suspended mid-air like fireflies
POSES: standing tall with wings half-open, exuding dominance
slow, graceful step forward as embers swirl
kneeling in a ritual stance, hands resting elegantly
leaning forward slightly with a teasing posture
hips turned subtly, gaze over the shoulder
arms open in a beckoning, seductive gesture
CAMERA_ANGLES: low angle emphasizing horns and wings
three-quarter view enhancing curves and silhouette
close-up on face with embers reflecting in eyes
medium shot centered on upper body and infernal ornaments
slightly high angle revealing ritual markings beneath
dramatic side-shot with drifting ash in foreground
ATMOSPHERES: heavy with drifting embers and warm smoke
seductive tension in the air, like before a ritual
slow burning haze softening the scene
ancient infernal pressure radiating through the ground
dreamlike molten glow blending into shadows
mystical dark charm infused with heat and danger
ACCESSORIES: ritual bracelets shaped from molten metal
infernal ear jewelry shaped like twisted bone

HORROR_INTENSITY.0: Soft infernal beauty with subtle demonic traits and elegant warmth.
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: Noticeable demonic anatomy, glowing runes and hints of dangerous hunger beneath the charm.
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: Seductive but frightening demon, horns sharp as blades, molten veins, fiery gaze and an aura of ancient predatory power.
